title: BEAUTIFUL 2 BED APARTMENT FOR RENT
posting_body: 2 bed 1 bathroom apt for rent in a private house.
Private entrance, with all utilities included.
Property is near transportation and close to shopping centers.
Please email me to schedule a view.
$35 application fee PER PERSON, Ready to move in.
Requirements to apply: Full Background, credit score 600 or better, need to provide ID, Social
Security and proof of income( last 3 bank statements, last 4 consecutive paystubs) call Maria for a pre-screening.
